articles.title: Clop ransomware claims it breached 130 orgs using GoAnywhere zero-day - BleepingComputer
articles.description: The Clop ransomware gang claims to be behind recent attacks that exploited a zero-day vulnerability in the GoAnywhere MFT secure file transfer tool, saying they stole data from over 130 organizations.
